Legal_Issue: Reasonableness of RPD decision on state protection and credibility
Credibility_Assessment: Claimant's credibility found lacking; refusal to pay protection money not sufficiently substantiated
Evidence_Type: Testimonial evidence, legislative efforts against crime in Poland
Basis_of_Claim: Fear of persecution due to refusal to pay protection money
Key_Factor_in_Determination: Availability of state protection in Poland
Review_Outcome: No intervention warranted; RPD decision upheld
Decision_Review_Issue: Credibility and adequacy of state protection
Governing_Rule_or_Provision: Presumption of state protection unless rebutted by clear and convincing evidence
Cause_of_Refusal: Insufficient evidence of lack of state protection and credibility concerns
Evidentiary_Issues: Lack of corroborating evidence for persecution claim
Procedural_Fairness: No breach of natural justice found
Credibility_Issues: Claimant's testimony not found credible regarding threats
Legal_Defense_or_Challenge: Challenge to RPD's credibility and state protection findings
